name: Blendy! Juicy Maker Ice Glass
description:
Have fun matching with Blendy! Juicy Maker Ice Glass. Show your superb navigation skills. The graphics make for an extraordinary gaming experience. Being tactical in your movements will result in you becoming victorious. Be entertained and enjoy the new era of gaming and roleplaying. Have a great time.

Game Features:

• Several tools that will help you create unique and delicious juices

 • Joomla drawings 

• Amazing realistic graphics 

• Multiple challenging levels 

• Very easy to navigate

 • A smoothie making paradise
